header.title: We create experiences from a different point of view

play.title: Explore
play.subtitle: Select the icon and enjoy our demo Apps
play.cup:
App CUP is an application designed to facilitate and speed up the booking and managing of medical examinations. You can register different profiles to manage appointments for the whole family. Search filters allow you to easily know the availability of the nearest hospitals at the desired time. Payments made through the app confirm your reservations. At the hospital, you can check in, obtaining your reservation code, and go to the room where your exam will be done.


   Try the demo App!
play.park: Parking is an application for those who travel by car or motorbike and need to quickly find a parking space. Parking will show a list of the nearest parking lots based on availability of space, providing information on rates and types of parking available. You can register several vehicles and activate multiple parkings at the same time. Credit is uploaded directly in the app, so you can make the payment and check out directly from your smartphone
play.cata: Catalog Application is originally a business product, the ideal substitute of paper catalogs used in a commercial environment. It allows you to show all the products in your range, complete with the relevant technical information, product images and multimedia content, and to manage easily and user-friendly your customers' purchase orders.
play.cards: Fidelity is a fictional chain of stores specialized in the sale of sportswear, created for demonstration purposes. The application allows you to register your loyalty cards and manage collection points and discount coupons; browse the product catalog, active promotions and the list of sales points; take part in Play & Win competitions using the QR code printed on the receipt; use the Augmented Reality section to explore the multimedia content associated with products in the store

features.title:
We realize original projects to
improve your business and satisfy users
with beautiful and useful experiences.
features.anyNeedSub: Information consulting, E-commerce and M-commerce, Engagement, Management.
features.mobileApp:
The most effective communication is fast, clear, designed for the smart user. In a word: App.
Lutech Mobile is a division of Lutech, specialized in developing Mobile Applications both Enterprise and Consumer.
features.interDes: We design and implement mobile interfaces thought to the user (consumer or business) combining creativity and technical skills development and usability, with the aim to offer the best user experience (UX UI).
features.platDev: Standalone native development or MEAP (Mobile Enterprise Application Platform) platform? Discuss and choose together. Thanks to our experience and acquired certifications we are able to guide you in your choice.
features.techCons: We offer Technical Consulting in the mobile sector with particular focus to the following areas: Enterprise and Consumer Mobile Apps, Mobile App legacy integration, MDM (Mobile Device Management) implementation, MAM (Mobile Application Management) implementation, Mobile Project and Program Management.
features.mobDev: The BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) is becoming ever more common. This requires to enterprise a greater effort in the security field. We consider devices and applications management as part of your 'Mobile Strategy'.
features.mobEng: Customer Engagement is the key word for today's business. The mobile device is in the middle of the customer experience. With our Mobile Engagement solutions, you can increase the satisfaction and loyalty of your customer.
